trivia_items.text: His codename refers to stainless steel, fitting his role as a mechanist of Eartha.
Stainless has the traits of a ragdoll cat, as seen from his thick tail and ear color.
Because of his codename KR players jokingly called him 스뎅 (Romanized: Seudeng) which is a shortening of stainless steel in Korean.
His English lines are spoken in East End accent, a variant of Cockney accent specifically spoken from East End London.
Stainless is the first male 6★ Operator who debuts alongside a new Main Theme episode.
